title: Part 822 - Assignment Of Counsel And Appointment Of Physicians
content:
Part 822 - Assignment Of Counsel And Appointment Of Physicians

State Regulations
§ 822.1 - Assignment of counsel
§ 822.2 - Maintenance of lists of approved attorneys
§ 822.3 - Appointment of psychiatrists or physicians
§ 822.4 - Compensation of counsel and physicians in excess of statutory limits

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
